name: Glacial Crawler
movement: walk 30 ft., burrow 30 ft., climb 20 ft., swim 60 ft.
description: A Huge, formidable Aberration known for its unique combination of acid and cold immunities, it can proficiently traverse snow and water, with a tough outer coating that deals acid damage to attackers.
memorable: Its ability to coat attackers in superheated digestive juices makes it a dangerous foe in close quarters.
goals: Survival and combat effectiveness without moral considerations.
relations: May encounter other cold-based creatures or aberrations.
environment: Often found in icy or snowy terrains.
strengths: Immunity to acid, cold, and fire damage; high constitution.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, unable to strategize effectively.
attacks: Multiattack with two Bites dealing piercing and acid damage, possibly grappling foes; ranged attacks with a spitting ability that combines acid and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Acidic Spray, dealing significant area damage and applying ongoing effects.
senses: Blindsight and tremorsense allow it to detect creatures in its vicinity despite being blind.
skills: Limited perceptive abilities with a passive perception score of 18.
additional_information: Can create a tunnel while burrowing through snow and ice.
Advantage on stealth checks in snowy environments.
Has a diverse set of offensive and defensive capabilities.
test_queries: creature with acid coating and burrowing ability
monster that swims and traverses snow easily
ice monster that hides in snowy terrain
